main.docTitle: Electricity Networks (Statutory Easements) (Rectification of Approved Scheme) (Consolidation) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This order may be cited as the Electricity Networks (Statutory Easements) (Rectification of Approved Scheme) (Consolidation) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: approved scheme (獲准計劃) means the scheme specified in the Schedule;
power company (電力公司) means the China Light & Power Company, Limited;
Secretary (地政司) means the Secretary for Planning, Environment and Lands. (L.N. 244 of 1989)

section.name: s3
section.heading: Rectification of approved scheme
section.leadIn: Subject to section 7(3) of the Ordinance, the approved scheme shall have effect as rectified by—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the agreement made between the power company and the Secretary and deposited in the Land Registry on 21 October 1981; (L.N. 8 of 1982)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the agreement made between the power company and the Secretary and deposited in the Land Registry on 1 June 1984; and (L.N. 188 of 1984)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the agreement made between the power company and the Secretary and deposited in the Land Registry on 2 September 1988. (L.N. 264 of 1988)

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.heading: Approved Scheme
schedule.text: 400 kV New Territories network; 5 March 1981. Approved by the Secretary for the Environment and deposited in the Land Registry on 5 March 1981.
